definitions.definition: if a person or an organization holds the copyright on a piece of writing, music, etc., they are the only people who have the legal right to publish, broadcast, perform it, etc., and other people must ask their permission to use it or any part of it
definitions.sensetop: copyright in/on somethingout of copyrightin copyright
